Comment: A decade ago, I probably would have said the same thing. Be MLK Jr, not Malcolm X kind of thinking.   But then Trump won two elections and shipped brown people to Guantanamo and El Salvador for, pretty much, no reason other than their skin color. Without any due process. So no, not anymore.   The time for politeness and “productive disagreement” is over. My rights and the rights of people I care about are under attack. So if it takes saying “I fucking told you so” to motivate people, I say do it. And if they’re willing to die on the Trump train, I say let them.   ***Because contrary to what you’re implying, what we were doing before, with the taking the high road and being the bigger person and not reminding people that they got what they wanted before and it burned them, that’s what didn’t work. That’s what lost 2024. The only certain way to lose in 2026 is to do again what already didn’t work.***
Author: Chiquitarita298
